title: How Do I Avoid The Budgeting Guilt-Cycle?
description:
Berna is back with Tiffany Aliche for today's Loose Change, presented by Public.com, to dive deeper into budgeting and continue their conversation from earlier this week. They get into some more mindset related questions about budgeting and breakdown a few important things to keep in mind as you go through your financial journey. Make sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to stay up to date with the podcast and submit your questions!
Thanks again to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
